message: I keep getting a 503 error trying to log in to multiplayer. Server upgrades?

I read somewhere the authentication goes through minecraft.net (as opposed to a direct connect with the mp host server) so if minecraft.net is going through server issues you can't play online, basically. Boo!
It's 1235am anyway so probably bedtime anyway :-p
Still getting 503. Uninstalled minecraft and deleted associated files (OS X)
www.minecraft.com will not load either. Thinking the servers are pwnd

yeah.... this is an ongoing pain in the butt... they're working on it apparently.  A server owner can change the settings to online_mode=false and this will stop it from needing authentication... but that means anyone can log-in as anyone... so... without decent plugins and protection isn't not a great idea expect as a temporary fix
